items.title: Markets set to snap 5-month decline in March, April's seasonality hints at more gains
items.description: Over the past 10 years, Nifty has ended April in the green on 7 occasions, delivering an average return of 2.4 percent

items.title: BoB, PNB lead as PSU banking shares rise to support benchmarks, a day after key bill sails through
items.description: The Nifty PSU Bank index is currently the top gaining sector among NSE indices, supporting gains on Sensex and Nifty, which are higher after a muted start. Bank of Baroda was the top gainer on the index with Citi maintaining a Buy rating and opening a 'positive catalyst watch' on the stock.

items.title: IRM Energy shares jump 14% on securing 5-year contract with Shell Energy India
items.description: IRM Energy made a tepid market debut last year and is currently trading at 43 percent below its issue price

items.title: CLSA flags US tariff shock for Indian component makers, says JLR faces tough road ahead
items.description: Sona BLW and Bharat Forge are particularly vulnerable, deriving 43 percent and 38 percent of their revenues from the US, with most of their products manufactured in India. This leaves them fully exposed to higher duties, potentially impacting margins and pricing strategies.

items.title: Buy Sobha; target of Rs 1447: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: Geojit Financial Services is bullish on Sobha has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 1447 in its research report dated March 26, 2025.

items.title: Morgan Stanley warns of JLR hit as US tariffs loom over Tata Motors; stock down 7%
items.description: The brokerage says that if the company bears part of the tariff burden, operating margins could take a 200-bps hit, posing a downside risk to the firm’s 8.3 percent FY26 EBIT estimate.

items.title: Wipro shares rise 2%, top Nifty gainer after signing $650 mn deal with ReAssure UK
items.description: The contract, signed between Wipro and its fully owned subsidiary, Wipro Financial Outsourcing Services, is aimed at providing platform-based life and pension third-party administration services for ReAssure

items.title: Sensex up 400 pts, Nifty above 23,600 as bank, oil & gas stocks rally; Trump tariffs roil auto, ancillary shares
items.description: The broader market was little changed with the Nifty Midcap 100 and Smallcap 100 gaming 0.1 percent, each.

items.title: L&T shares climb as BNP Paribas maintains "outperform" rating on hopes of strong year ahead
items.description: L&T secured an ultra-mega offshore contract for North Field Production Sustainability Offshore (Hydrocarbon) Compression Project

items.title: Macquarie initiates coverage on Trent with 'outperform' tag, believes stock can rally 32%
items.description: Macquarie said noted that compared to peers, Trent leads the pack on key metrics, such as growth, return profile and inventory turns.

items.title: BSE shares gain 4%, snap 3-day losing streak after exchange says it will consider bonus share issue
items.description: The stock exchange last issued bonus shares in 2022 in the ratio of 2:1

items.title: Agri Picks Report March 27, 2025: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit Financial Services, The Securities and Exchange Board of India has extended the suspension of derivatives trade in wheat, chana, moong, paddy (non-basmati), mustard seeds and its derivatives, soya bean, and crude palm oil by another year, till Mar. 31, 2026, the regulator said in a release on Monday. In 2021, the government had imposed a ban on derivatives trading in the seven commodities for a year to check rising prices.

items.title: Can Sensex, Nifty regain momentum as Trump’s auto tariffs add to market jitters? Key levels to watch today
items.description: In the previous session, the frontline indices slumped, snapping a seven-day rally, as selling in SBI, HDFC Bank, and ICICI Bank, along with major oil & gas names pulled markets deep into the red.

items.title: Newgen Software shares surge 2% after it secures $1.28 million contract
items.description: Adding to its business momentum, last month, Newgen Software executed a Statement of Work (SoW) with a US-based client

items.title: Sky Gold: Will the glowing performance continue?
items.description: Jewellery demand is back after a brief lull following the price spike

items.title: JSW Infra shares gain after acquiring slurry pipeline business for Rs 1,617 crore
items.description: This deal not only bolsters JSW Infrastructure’s logistics portfolio but also seamlessly aligns with JSW Steel’s raw material transportation strategy in Odisha

items.title: Neogen Chemicals at a crucial juncture despite the fire accident
items.description: Neogen is making bold strides into the growing battery chemicals space, eyeing exponential growth in a rapidly expanding market. However, challenges on the path to scale-up and key industry dynamics are shaping its journey.

items.title: Trump's 25% auto tariff: Will Indian carmakers, ancillary companies face a speed bump? Tata Motors likely to bear maximum impact
items.description: JLR sold over 400,000 units globally in FY24 out of which about 23 percent came from the US; India’s auto ancillary firms — Sona BLW Precision Forgings, Bharat Forge, and Samvardhana Motherson International Limited (SAMIL) — are also staring at turbulence

items.title: United Spirits shares surge 2% after alcoholic beverage-maker declares interim dividend of Rs 4
items.description: In another exchange filing, the company said that its board has approved the appointment of Praveen Someshwar as the Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer for a period of five years.

items.title: Lupin, Zydus Life, other shares plunge up to 7%, as fears of Trump's pharma tariffs spook investors
items.description: Trump had earlier said on March 24 that he will announce tariffs on automobiles, pharmaceuticals and aluminum in the near future. With the new tariffs in place for automobiles, investors worry that pharmaceuticals may be next on the list.
